narrative.narrative: Daallo Airlines is based at Dubai,UAE but has its hub at Djibouti on the Horn of Africa in West Africa. As of 2014 they had 5 destinations, all in Africa and the Middle East. They previously served London and Paris too. Last reports in May 2014 say they had a Airbus A321-200, a BAe-200 and a 737-300 which East Air operates. They have been known to operate many plane types over their life, like a DC-9-30,Tupolev 154,Antonov-24,Il-18,Boeing 767,Boeing 757,Let 410,Antonov 12,,and Il-76, and 727-200. It was founded in 1991 and first used a Cessna.

prefereds.aircrafts: Boeing 737-300,BAe 146-200,Airbus A321-200,MD DC-9-20,MD DC-9-40,Tupolev Tu-154M,Antonov An-24,Boeing 727-200 Adv.,Il-18E,Il-18D,Let L-410,Boeing 757-200,Boeing 767-200
